summary:
Formaldehyde is a colorless gas with a strong smell. It is a simple chemical made of carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen (CH2O). This gas can turn into a solid called paraformaldehyde. It is often found as a liquid called formalin, mixed with water. 

Formaldehyde is very useful and is made in large amounts for things like resins, particle board, and coatings. But it's also dangerous; it can cause irritation and is linked to cancer.
title: Formaldehyde
